summary: A self-absorbed writer, stuck in more ways than one, rediscovers himself, his offbeat family, and what it means to be happy when he meets Joy, a spirited young woman who asks him to write her obituary.
cast: Josh Cooke|Liane Balaban|Barry Bostwick|Lainie Kazan|Tyler Bunch|Kiki Harris|Arielle Hoffman|Andrew Satee|Marge Hartnett|Juliana Harkavy|Joan Turner Turetzky|Dingo|Marylou Dinicolas|Taylor Anthony Miller|Milo|Carmen Lopez|Fredrick Bam Scott|Damon Sementilli
title: Finding Joy
